word:
[NOTE FROM SECRETARY.] SISTER WHITE: I HAVE COPIED THE ABOVE TESTIMONY EXCEPT THE SCRIPTURES WHICH I ONLY REFER TO, GIVING THE CHAPTER AND VERSE. SISTER D. HAS MADE A PUBLIC CONFESSION BEFORE THE CHURCHES OF TUSCOLA COUNTY AND APPEARS TO HAVE SOME FRUIT OF REPENTANCE. SHE HAS MADE SOME CONFESSIONS TO INDIVIDUALS, BUT A GREAT WORK IS BEFORE HER. M.E.C. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D.C. Jan. 22, 1988. Entire Ms.
